text: Jean-Claude Beaulieu (born June 24, 1944 in Payroux) is a member of the National Assembly of France. He represents the Charente-Maritime department, and is a member of the Union for a Popular Movement. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:People from Vienne Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Jean-Claude Beaulieu
